text: O niyom likha khan aru Pharisee khan, tumi kopoti khan ke hai ase! Kilekoile tumikhan pudina, aru pata, aru dhaniya laga dos bhag di thake, aru bisi ujon thaka niyom, faisla, maph, aru biswas laga kotha khan ke chari diye- eitu khan bhi kori bole laga asele, hoilebi dusra khan bhi nakorikena nacharibo lage.
